titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the increased limitation on the cover over of the tax on distilled spirits to Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/17/2012--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2013 the increase in the amount of distilled spirits tax covered into the treasuries of Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.
